name: Zebra Pen Steel, JK-Refill Gel Ink Refills, 0.7mm Medium Point, Black Ink, Fits G-301, G-450, and G-750 Gel Pens, Smooth and Consistent Writing Performance, 2-Pack (88112)
short_description: Exclusively compatible with Zebra Pen STEEL gel pens: Designed for the G-301, G-450, and G-750 models, this refill keeps your favorite gel pens writing like new with smooth, bold lines.
Smooth-flowing black gel ink with medium point: The 0.7mm tip delivers rich, consistent lines that glide effortlessly across the page—ideal for journaling, notes, and professional use.
Reliable ink flow for clean, skip-free results: Whether you’re writing fast or slow, the gel ink keeps up—great for daily use at home, work, or school with a polished, smudge-resistant finish.
Quick and easy refill process preserves performance: Snaps securely into your existing G-series STEEL pen to maintain its balanced feel, premium construction, and writing control.
Convenient 2-pack for uninterrupted writing: A great value for students, professionals, and creatives who rely on their Zebra Pen STEEL gel pens to deliver every time.
product_description: Keep your Zebra Pen STEEL gel pens writing at their best with the Zebra JK-Refill 0.7mm Medium Point Black Gel Ink, 2-Pack (SKU 88112). Designed specifically for the G-301, G-450, and G-750 models, this refill delivers smooth, vivid black gel ink for professional-quality results. The 0.7mm medium point creates bold, skip-free lines that glide across the page—ideal for writing, journaling, or business use. Built to preserve the premium experience of your G-series pen, this refill installs easily and performs consistently. The 2-pack format ensures you’ll always have a backup ready when you need it.

name: Pilot, G2 Gel Ink Refills, Fine Point 0.7 mm, Black, Pack of 6
short_description: G2 Refills: Enables you to continue using your favorite gel pen without needing to replace the entire pen; G2 has been proven to be the longest-lasting gel ink pen that allows you to write more (Data on File)

Smooth & Vibrant Ink: Smooth-flowing gel ink glides effortlessly across paper, producing precise, clean lines; Available in ultra-fine, extra-fine, fine and bold point sizes so you can find the perfect pen for your writing style
Versatile: Perfect for everyday writing tasks and creative projects like drawing, sketching or doodling; Ideal for use at home, school, or in the office
Quick Drying & Compatible: The vibrant, quick drying ink helps prevent smudges and smears for neat and professional-quality documents; Fits a wide variety of Pilot gel ink pens
Power to the Pen: Express yourself effortlessly with Pilot's line of innovative writing tools, including gel ink, erasable, rolling ball, ballpoint and fountain pens, & dry erase markers & more
product_description: Ensure your cherished Pilot gel pens never run out of ink with these gel ink refills. They offer a cost-effective solution, reducing waste and extending your pen's lifespan. Compatible with several Pilot gel pen lines, these refills make it easy to find the perfect match for your Pilot pen model. The long-lasting G2 ink lets you write more, offering better value. These refills feature smooth and vibrant ink that delivers clean and crisp lines with every stroke for legible writing or drawing. The quick-drying ink resists smudges and smears. Perfect for your everyday writing needs, the 0.7 mm fine pen point size strikes a balance between fine and bold lines. Archival-safe and acid-free black ink is formulated to be long-lasting and fade-resistant, ensuring your documents last for a long time. Choose Pilot pen refills for a seamless and uninterrupted writing experience, so your favorite pen remains a trusted writing tool for years to come.
